entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 2:30 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 2:30 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
